page.title: 18HOUSING IN WOLVERLEY
page.content: A housing survey was done in the village of {Wolverley}under the following headings: 1. House Types and 2. Building materials It showed that in the original village of {Wolverley},built close to the church,{the buildings}were built of both{stone}and{brick}and had both {tile}and{slate}roofs.This is the oldest part of the village and has a number of{cottages },{Georgian } houses and a {Victorian }terrace. In{Fairfield },which is the modern part of the village the buildings are mostly{detached}and {semi-detached houses}and{bungalows. There is a mixture of{private estates and{council}housing in this part of the village.
